bibl.title: Soft Toys from Egypt.
bibl.note: Concentrates on a rag doll and her wardrobe from a child's grave of the Constantinian period at Hawara, now in the Petrie Museum (UC.28024 and UC.28030).

bibl.title: Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993

bibl.seg: JANSSEN Rosalind M., Soft Toys from Egypt.

Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993 = JRA. Supplementary Series. 19 (Ann Arbor, Michigan, 1996) pp. 231-239, 9 figg.
Concentrates on a rag doll and her wardrobe from a child's grave of the Constantinian period at Hawara, now in the Petrie Museum (UC.28024 and UC.28030).
